main event: Multiple UFO sightings and radar tracking at Patuxent River NAS, Md. in 1959 involving rapid descents, erratic movements, and high-speed travel.
interesting points: The object observed at Patuxent River NAS descended rapidly, hovered, and then ascended and oscillated wildly in erratic flight.
Several jet interceptors were scrambled to investigate the object but were unable to make visual contact.
A meteorite passed between two airliners at dangerously close range in Durban, South Africa.
Base officials at Patuxent River NAS studied a metallic object retrieved near Hamilton, Maryland, indicating it might be associated with flight operations.
A decline in enrollment in engineering schools was reported, possibly due to fear of unemployment on graduation and concerns about the rights of female engineering graduates.
witnesses: radar operators, jet interceptors, newspaper reports
